summary.para: Contains process mitigation policy settings for Control Flow Guard (CFG). The and functions use this structure.
This member is reserved for system use.
CFG is enabled for the process if this flag is set. This field cannot be changed via .

If TRUE, exported functions will be treated as invalid indirect call targets by default. Exported functions only become valid indirect call targets if they are dynamically resolved via . This field cannot be changed via .

If TRUE, all DLLs that are loaded must enable CFG. If a DLL does not enable CFG then the image will fail to load. This policy can be enabled after a process has started by calling . It cannot be disabled once enabled.
This member is reserved for system use.
